Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI LODR Regulations
Clarification sought from Infosys Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Infosys Ltd with reference to the media report appearing on https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/company/corporate-trends/dggi-issues-rs-415-crore-showcause-notice-to-infosys-over-alleged-ineligible-itc-refunds/articleshow/124375835.cms (Source: https:// economictimes.indiatimes.com) dated October 08 2025 titled "DGGI issues Rs 415 crore showcause notice to Infosys over alleged ineligible ITC refunds".

The Company is requested to submit its clarification to the Exchange in terms of the provisions of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.
